messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION:
messages.content: Strong, stable leadership in the national interest or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn. Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON'T BE SO SURE.

messages.title: THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE:
messages.content: Higher Debt, Higher Taxes, Economic Chaos

images.caption: RICHARD BENYON Newbury STANDING WITH THERESA MAY

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet juxtaposes strong, stable leadership with the prospect of a coalition with Jeremy Corbyn, implying a negative outcome. The use of contrasts and appeals to stability suggest a strategic campaign approach highlighting both leadership and risks of change.
